channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The haunting consequences of ignoring tech debt in an agentic AI world
item.description: I'm Accenture's global cyber AI reinvention leader and the U.S. spends $1.52 trillion on tech debt, constantly fixing aging or clunky software. Now th...

item.title: AI empowers criminals to launch ‘customized attacks at scale’—but could also help firms fortify their defenses, say tech industry leaders
item.description: Generative AI and more digital connections are opening up new avenues for cyberattacks.

item.title: A Disney ‘Star Wars’ Show Is Back With A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Disney Star Wars has been up and down, but a show has returned that boasts a new 100% Rotten Tomatoes scored season, and is one of the best of the era...

item.title: The bloodbath in stocks was ‘the end of the cutting season,’ BofA says: Now we’re on alert for the ‘fail risks’ of 2025
item.description: No major central banks are expected to cut rates again this year, BofA predicts.

item.title: Near Death Experience (NDE) Meets The Twilight Of Death
item.description: Modern biological research into what’s called “organismal death” calls into question what we mean when we refer to life, death, afterlife, and near de...

item.title: When “a few degrees” Becomes Dangerous - Living with Extreme Heat
item.description: Extreme heat is a growing global threat and our leaders need to understand the complex ways in which it impacts our people and planet, and must act ur...

item.title: PayPal Attack Update: Another ‘Do Not Pay’ Warning Issued
item.description: The ‘do not pay, do not phone’ warning for PayPal users has been confirmed once more, as hackers launch another PayPal invoice-based attack.

item.title: The “Humanity” Hack: How One MIT Scientist Is Rewiring Robots To Beat Big Tech
item.description: MIT’s Daniela Rus is redefining robotics with empathy leading CSAIL and Liquid AI recent $250m series A to build technology that helps humanity think,...

item.title: Largest US airlines raise pressure on Dems to 'pass a clean CR' and end shutdown
item.description: Major U.S. airlines are calling on Congress to reopen the government as TSA workers and air traffic controllers are continuing to work without pay.

item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO: AI’s opportunity is enormous, but ‘there will be winners and losers’
item.description: David Solomon sees artificial intelligence as a major catalyst for U.S. economic growth—but warns that the path ahead won’t be a straight line.

item.title: Meta’s $27 billion bet turns AI compute into Wall Street’s hottest new investment
item.description: As the AI data center build out charges ahead at full speed, a new asset class is emerging.

item.description: U.S. retailers are reportedly offering more discounts on Hershey candy before Halloween as the candy maker hiked prices over tariffs and cocoa inflati...

item.title: Mortgage rates fall for fourth consecutive week, lowest level in over a year

item.description: The Federal Reserve cut its benchmark interest rate for the second time this year despite elevated inflation amid concerns about weakness in the labor...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
